text: wql -ayha alrswl-: alhamd lilah aladhi lah alkmal walthna', aldhy tnzzah ean alwld walsharik fi alwhyth, wala yakun lah subhanah wly min khalaqah fahu alghaniu alqwy, wahum alfuqara' almhtajwn 'ilyh, wezzimh tezymana tamana balthna' ealayh webadth wahdah la sharik lh, w'ikhlas aldiyn kuluh lh
